TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITestAssemblyRunner

Docs.summary: The ITestAssemblyRunner interface is implemented by classes that are able to execute a suite of tests loaded from an assembly.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Load (System.Reflection.Assembly assembly, System.Collections.IDictionary settings);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Load(class System.Reflection.Assembly assembly, class System.Collections.IDictionary settings) cil managed

Docs.param: Dictionary of settings to use in loading the test
Docs.summary: Loads the tests found in an Assembly, returning an indication of whether or not the load succeeded.
Docs.returns: True if the load was successful

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Load (string assemblyName, System.Collections.IDictionary settings);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Load(string assemblyName, class System.Collections.IDictionary settings) cil managed

Docs.param: File name of the assembly to load
Dictionary of settings to use in loading the test
Docs.summary: Loads the tests found in an Assembly, returning an indication of whether or not the load succeeded.
Docs.returns: True if the load was successful

Docs.summary: Gets the tree of loaded tests, or null if no tests have been loaded.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public NUnit.Framework.Api.ITestResult Run (NUnit.Framework.Api.ITestListener listener, NUnit.Framework.Api.ITestFilter filter);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class NUnit.Framework.Api.ITestResult Run(class NUnit.Framework.Api.ITestListener listener, class NUnit.Framework.Api.ITestFilter filter) cil managed

Docs.param: A test filter used to select tests to be run
Docs.summary: Run selected tests and return a test result. The test is run synchronously, and the listener interface is notified as it progresses.
